content.detailedDescription: Was hiking a trail in cloud croft,new mexico taking pictures of mountains and surroundings.I looked up above me and took a photo of a nice looking cloud.L hiked some more and stopped to look at the picture of the cloud i had taken. when observing closely at it, i noticed something inside the cloud. i zoomed in on the cloud as close as possible and saw what seemed to be a person or some type of being standing on a platform looking down at me. at first i said to myself "this can't be real",but the more i observed the picture blown up closely afterwards,it definitely appears to be "someone" or "something" standing on a type of platform hiding under camafloug in a cloud.
content.summary: was taking pictures while hiking in cloudcroft new mexico and took photo of a cloud. after looking at picture zoomed in on it and saw what appeared to be a person or being standing on some type of platform.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 16 years old , had two frends with me in my s-10. i was about to drop my friends off at home due to it being a school nite. as we turned onto the eastern most road of my town we noticed an unusualy located and colord orange light straight to the south of us. it immediatley caught our attention. after 1/10 of a mile i stopped the truck and we all got out to watcht this event. the orange light was larger than a star. as we wated it seemed to change brightness but with no regular pattern  its action. shortly after we all had goten out of the truck the main light released 5-6 smaller ones that begun to(only way to say it) mill around kinda aimlessly. sometimes the smaller ones would have there view obstructed by trees on the horizon. after a while they migrqted back to the larger light where they originated. once all the small lights had returned to the large one it then began to slowly fade inbrightness, once faded out for a moment it then returned to being bright. it done that three times before prmanantly fading out.

i have several other events id like to have cataloged together if thats possible.
content.summary: Seen strange orange lights with two of my friends, im a life long experiencer of orange colord lights

content.detailedDescription:
This was a triangular craft. 3 or 4 lights on the back which were bright and 4 or 5 going towards the tip at different intensities. i have thought i have seen things before... but nothing as definitive as this!!!! 

honestly a little scared! i just got home from my daughters hockey game went out back to check on things, its quiet, look up and here it is silently floating across the sky until it faded in to the trees in my back yard and i lost it. i live near a small airport but not a lot of over night traffic, oh it is or was also a blackhawk base or repair site.
content.summary: This was a triangular craft. 3 or 4 lights on the back which were bright and 4 or 5 going towards the tip at different intensities.I have thought i have seen things before... but nothing as definitive as this!!!! honestly a little scared!

content.detailedDescription: That is ok if it is viewable to the public because i just had wendell swaithes, phd psych, tell me he wasnt able to contextualize my accidental complete dissection of the earth life system and time-space geometry and that i'm the only quantum consciousness engineer (with zero formal education beyond high school) david phillips is the name; quantum  consciousness engineer and interstellar uniform communications proxy sysadmin/analyst
content.summary: Routine interaction

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the gg bridge at crissy fields in san francisco and, right after but stepped a little forward, another one and the objects weren't there anymore. i actually didn't see anything with my eyes while taking the pictures, but i noticed something strange in the first pic i took, and i wonder if this could be an ufo.
attached you will find three pics. the first one taken with the objects, the second one taken right after without the objects and another one with the objects circled.
content.summary: Possible ufo over san francisco golden gate bridge

content.detailedDescription: Earlier that day i took pictures of the trees because the leaves were changing. i went through to send one and noticed a face in all four i snapped. that night while on our porch with friends i jokingly snapped a few more in the same direction and caught something weird. i zoomed in and found a completel different being. we couldn't see it or hear it but the phone caught it. i was a little frightened because it was just watching us and i was sitting closest to it.
content.summary: I took random pictures of the wooded mountain beside my house and actually got something i can't relate to any animal. been feeling watched since.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home. i have lots of other pictures taken at night but i couldn't see them during the day. i get sick when i observe them at night and i noticed recently that during the day i was getting the same kind of sickness. i decided to try shooting them during the day too. they are very small. the triangles at night is what made me start paying attention. there are always triangle lights, day and night. orbs too. i have figured out that the orbs are poison that makes me sick. i don't know if their intention is to make me sick (but i think it is) but it could be that they feel threaten by the flash of my camera. they seem to be busy harvesting something or studying. i am not scared but i do feel like i have radiation poisoning every time i go outside (they are always outside). i have thousands of pictures. mostly at night. i never see the objects with my naked eye, i feel their presence and pull out my camera and start shooting. this is not one of my best pictures i have of them but you will get the idea. i will show you the good ones when you come here and see for yourself. i mainly just want this ringing in my ears to stop. i can hear some kind of frequency, it's them! thank you for your time.

shelly west
409-221-1635
content.summary: I snapped pictures because i knew they were there, i just couldn't see them with the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed an object above the horizon shortly after a hailstorm on december 4th,2016 at approximately 4:40pm. i witnessed the object fall in a straight path for approximately 5 minutes, during which time i took several photos and video. the object disappeared at the horizon and we lost sight of the object.
content.summary: Slow falling object above the horizon after hailstorm.

content.detailedDescription: Observed glowing sphere behind house, that would respond and move in many directions while i flashed a flashlight at it. this occurred for an hour. we even asked it to move, and it would. it would remain stationary while commercial flights flew by. i watched sphere for an hour but got too cold. i went to house for warmer clothing and it was gone when i returned. my wife watched it for 15 minutes. we admit we became nervous. it appeared to move when i asked it with my thoughts. we live in a very remote area. you cannot see your hand in front of your face, hence the flashlight. we both agree this object was observing us, and was responding to the flashlight. frightening. thank you, nancy and tom
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nancy and i observed hovering ufo that responded to flashlight i pointed at object. it would move.

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of downtown new york and as i was viewing the picture i noticed the moon looked funny.  as i zoomed in it appears to look like a 3d moon?
content.summary: 3d moon?

content.detailedDescription: While walking through new york, i took a picture of the the james a. farley building.  i did not see the orb on the steps when i took the picture.  when zoomed in, the orb has white lights all around it.
content.summary: Pink orb on steps of building

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, november 4, 2016 my two children begged me to take them for a walk to a local pokémon hotspot. it was a crisp fall night, approximately 8:00pm, and for a night sky, the sky was bright and full of stars with no clouds or precipitation. at approximately 8:20pm we turned and began walking up a street with a slight incline, and my youngest child stopped to catch a pokémon and had lagged behind. i noticed he was no longer with us and i turned around to call to him to catch up, and right behind him were two huge black triangular craft, larger then the houses they were above, flying slowly and approximately 20 feet above the one story houses across the street, approximately twenty feet away. the second craft was flying at the same height as the first craft, immediately behind it. the two craft were black with three unwavering bright white lights at the three corners of the triangles, with a solid bright primary red light in the center of the craft. the craft were completely silent; they were almost on top of us and we never would have known they were there if i did not happen to look behind us. the two craft came from a western direction and were heading east. we observed the craft silently shift direction southeast before disappearing behind trees and we lost visual contact with the craft. we continued walking up the road away from the craft headed north, heading home, for approximately ten seconds, when i looked behind again to where we had sighted the craft. two more triangular craft were flying in the exact same direction in the exact location where the first two craft were sighted, and they turned and headed southeast in exactly the same spot that the other two craft had turned. it was as if we witnessed deja vu; as if we viewed the event again but this time at a slightly different angle, as we were slightly farther away from the craft the second time around. we walked back down to the location where we spotted and observed the first craft, this time from a farther distance away, as the craft were heading away from us, and at this point my eldest son managed to snap two photographs of these second two craft with his phone.

we turned east and onto my road, when we looked up into the sky and witnessed a patch of sky with between twenty and thirty balls of light, exact number unable to be determined, that looked like stars, except that they were moving. some of the lights were moving very slowly, almost imperceptibly, but other craft were moving so quick that they would leave a light trail behind them, as they shifted position. the lights were different colors, from red to bluish white to orange to bright white. we walked towards this activity in the sky, however, these lights were high up - like stars - and to the east of our location. our vision would occasionally be obstructed as we walked on our street due to street lamps, but the activity continued unabated as we reached our house. we ran inside and i asked my wife to come out and check out what was happening in the sky. approximately three minutes later, just after 8:30pm, we walked back outside and there was nothing in the sky where we had just observed the lights; not even observable stars.
content.summary: Four, possibly six black triangular ufo's sighted in close proximity, followed by approximately 20-30 starlike ufo in sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving in the leftmost southbound lane of i-5 when somewhere around mile 53, we saw a large row of lights slightly blurred by low-hanging clouds or mist. at first we thought it was an airplane or helicopter but as we drove closer we realized that they were blinking off and on at the same time (unlike an aircraft, whose lights alternate blinking) and it wasn't moving at all. it was hovering at about twice the height of the highway's street lamps. as we got closer and the mist thinned we saw there were about five lights, at first they seemed to be in a row but as we got closer we saw that they were actually circular, as if they were on the edge of a disc. as we passed, i looked back but it was gone. i checked the time (9:25 pm) right after we passed and even though i don't know the exact time before we saw it, i checked the time stamps on some texts i sent and there didn't seem to be any major time discrepancies.
content.summary: While driving southbound on the interstate my friend and i saw a hovering, blinking row of lights

content.detailedDescription: This was seen by my sister and her partner and they both took photos from there mobile phones and they both have the pictures of this objects.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription: My sister and her partner took separate pictures of this and they only noticed when they came to look at the photos and realised they had both got the same picture.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My sister took these pictures this morning

content.detailedDescription: Took pictures on the train going to new york :-)
content.summary: New york pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard taping the moon.
a shooting sound together with a swish pulled my attention, but all i've seen was a trail of a shooting star. 
i first thought it was a meteor.
when i went to watch the video i noticed a yellow red orange object with some symmetrical characteristics, and also it changed direction. 
i may be wrong, but my impression is that the object could be a kind of spaceship. 
unfortunately the object was too fast for my to get a longer video, it was only a coincidence if i got at lest less then a second. 
i'm uploading also a short video and pics of anew lighting object that i thought it was an helicopter but the sound was different.
content.summary: I was taping moon when a shooting sound followed immediately by a meteor like object that changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of friday, sep 2, 2016. after a long day of work, i retired to my bed and ready to sleep. i also had a lunch meet-up appointment with my buddy on the next day so i went to bed by midnight, which was earlier than my usual friday night sleep time.

perhaps sometime at 1 or 2 am, i was awake but still in my bed. there was a bright white light emitting from my 4 o'clock (my head is at 12 o'clock position as a reference). the light came from a white ball of light. it was so bright that my eyes were filled with tears and i had to turn my head slightly to the left to avoid it. the light was so white and bright like it was coming from either a high power flood light or the sun. it must be noted that although the washroom light was on during the night and it was in the vicinity of my bed, it was a energy saving light bulb and its colour was yellowish dim.

i remember that right before i turned my head, there was a tingling sensation in my breathing tube traveling upward between my collar bone to my jaw. it was itching and i remember that i brushed my neck with both hands downward.

i dont remember seeing any entities or physical contacts during the entire event and i was laid down on my bed the entire time; i also dont remember if my lower body was immobile.

the next day, i got up with the sense of a bit restless but didnt give much thought. my friend later noticed that i was behaving a little bit agitated while i was looking for a parking spot at mall. it could be the result of the event or perhaps it was stress related.

but our lunch was the last meat i have eaten for the past three months. somehow that encounter changed my diet habit and i dont find red meat and chicken appetizing anymore. my diet has become almost vegetarian. i do eat fish and seafood from time to time, but i know i can also live without them. my weight dropped and i felt more healthy and my brain more active for all these months.

what really blew my mind was a physical evidence that i cannot simply treat this as a dream or human psychological response to stress. this event had left a physical mark on my chest. i found it very similar to the scoop mark left on some of the abductees' bodies. it has been three months since the event and that mark still remains in its original shape and colour. there is no other physical symptoms, pain or itching coming from it. of course, it wasnt there before and no scratch cannot heal in three months.

i dont sense it was a malevolent encounter and i have not had another one since then, or at least any that i can remember.
content.summary: A possible et abduction or experiment at bedroom after midnight

content.detailedDescription: I leftwork around midnightand headed southon rt 9 w, as i came around the top of buchburgh mountain i saw the lightoverthe atomicpower plant,,,atthe bottom ipulledoverby the river and gotout towatch it,,,,it circled slowly at a low altitude,,,itmade no sound atall,it was very quiet and dark where is was, i am a pilot with wellover 500 hoursinmy 1943 stearman biplane and am very familiar with aircraft of alltypes,,,,after watching fora whileiwent south and observed   the light stillnear the power plant bu now tomy northeast,,,,itthen seemed that the light went out andididnt seeit again,,,,it didnt make any sound and circle in a non wabbley way at a low altiude aroun the power plant,,,,,,pleastry to straighten this dialog out a little,,,im am disabledand have trouble spelling etc, i have several more sighting overs the years that i will relate to you one at a time,,
content.summary: Saw yelloish round lighted  object, silent, circle the indianpoint atomic power plant in peekskill new york on the hudson river

content.detailedDescription: While at driving north on huron road towards linwood from bay city just before first stop light in linwood about 3 miles before marathon on the left above the power lines and trees about 500 feet in the air was a large orange light hovering above the houses. i slowed down and watched it go about 300 feet higher in a matter of a second. i continued north about two or three miles turned around and went back as i came back up to the stop light on my way back towards bay city (south) the orange/red light had almost neared the stop light heading north in my direction and as i neared it, it veered right (east) out in to the direction of the bay over a large field and trees then it was gone from my site. the whole incident took place in a matter of 5 minutes at 3:17 am. the orange light did not blink or falter and moved with a smooth fluid motion, not erratic  in any way and it did not go very fast. almost like coasting. it had no sound as i slowed way down with my window down to listen, it was not a blinding light, you could clearly see it had a oval outline shaped very much like a street light but not as bright. it was a warm soft  orange/red  glow. due to driving on the highway i was unable to get a picture or video. i travel the same road 7 nights a week. i have not seen this before but hope to catch it again. i put my camera in the car this morning!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange/red colored light over linwood, michigan

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed and went to sleep that night i woke up in a room with a metal bed like a hospital bed there was lights and tools i wasn't straped down so i went to the door it opened as i got close to it so i explored this ship it was large many decks i had to hide as i went around the ship so they didn't see me. after 2 or 3 hours they started looking for me. they found me and then i woke up on my couch.
content.summary: I went to sleep that night woke up on the ship. i was able to wounder around and see stuff

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was taking a drive on highway 2-75 towards columbus ohio and i saw lights in the sky. the color lights were white, green, and red at the time and it looked kind've cylinder like. when i saw it i immediately thought ufo, as i usually do if it's not during the day. as we were getting closer to the object it was getting larger obviously but it didn't look like a cylinder anymore. at  this point it was starting to look like an airplane because it took more of a triangular shape. now it was huge and no longer looked like an airplane because of its massive size and obvious triangular shape. i start taking snapchat videos and sending them to my friends without saving them. now it's so huge i have absolutely no idea what's going on and all of a sudden it kind've turned a little bit like a plane does and then it went back to it's normal, straight position. and i'm thinking "maybe it's a plane crashing" because we were also near the wright patterson air force base and i start hyperventilating and just absolutely freak out and thinking i was going to die and then i somehow calm down and see that this thing is a freaking ufo and it's ginormous and i just witnessed it but we passed it in a flash and i couldn't see it out of my window anymore. here's a discription of the plane as we got closer to it: blackish gray base with red lights somewhere on it and on the three corners there were 3 white lights. and although i didn't save any of the videos i took, my friend screenshotted a part of it and sent it back to me. this picture is from an iphone 6s and we weren't at the closest point but we weren't at the furthest point from the object.
content.summary: Gigantic triangular like ufo right above high way

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke at 3.30 4.00am to see intense white reflective lighting come thru my closed venetian and cloth blinds.
the lights resembled a halon fire system activated..And flashing in various sequence. i checked one window and looked out from first level of my two level farmhouse. i could not see directly verticle to catch a glimpse of object itself but as i got to third set of first level windows all lights ceaced at once. there were no sounds whatsoever during 3 minutes of activity.
it was a rainy cloudy night on a rural county road area 4 miles outside readstown wi.
there was no police activity or dept of transportation vehicles in area at time either...No other aircraft.
there rarely ever is oit here.
charles
content.summary: Awoke at 330 to 4.00am to see intense white lights flashinh in sequence in all windows of my small farmhouse..On se..Sw north and northeast windows.No sounds.These lights like a halon fire alarm thru all windows.As i looked oit 3rd set of windows the ligh

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog late morning on the 2nd of dec. i looked up and saw a unidentified object heading north. it didn't turn just keep a northern direction. it was white. no sound at all. it was low enough to hear sound from it but no sound. it was white and had a weird front end like angled bars connected to it.By the time i got my phone out of pocket it was heading away from me and the picture isn't very good. can you all enhance the photo? it startled me but since ufo's are common place now a days i wasn't surprised.
content.summary: Heading north, no sound although it was low enough, strange looking front, no wings, could be a drone, speed was about 40mph ground speed

content.detailedDescription: I was young and out riding my bike in the city park about one half mile from home in beech grove indiana. i stopped to get off and walk my bike up a steep hill. but my arms and legs were stuck . i could not move them at all. i was scared. i looked around, nothing . i looked up and peed my pants. a 25 to 30 foot disc was 50 to 100 feet above me. no lights or sound. a round hole opened in the middle and a bright white beem came out on me. the next thing i remember was seeing the earth get smaller and 3 what you now call grays. 2 on one side and one on the other side. i heard them , but not with my ears. but inside my head. they said that they were my friend and that they will need my help someday. they would let me know when and what later. the next thing i knew, it was the next night and i was asleep in the grass at the top of the hill with my bike next to me. i have never told anyone about this. i am now 58 and disabled.
content.summary: Taken into space. put back 24 hours later

content.detailedDescription: My wife then my girl friend and her sister and my self were on our way home at about 2:00 am we were crossing the rio grand river when i told them did you see that i stopped the car backed up and there it was a huge sphere red in color on the water or just hovering above the water we observed id for a few minutes after that my wife and her sister became frightened, and said lets get out of here. a few days later my wife told me that she had seen the object again in the sky after dark. this was in the summer of 1975. albuquerque new mexico.
content.summary: Very large sphere over or on the water over the rio grand river about 100 + feet in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: My father was driving my brother and i home after my boy scout meeting on evening. i was probably12 and my brother 9.     we lived 5 miles outside lafayette city limits and were probably a mile into the country i think sr 26 was probably referred to as rr5 which goes east from lafayette. all three of us witnessed the event simultaneously . a large green disc passed over the top of our station wagon probably traveling 300 mph 500 to 1000 ft above the road. it flew east quickly until out of sight.It did not land or touch ground so it was not a meteor as it maintained its elevation. we have always discussed it in the family and readily admitted the sighting although most people probably don't believe it. my dad died in 1992 but my brother is still living and we mention it every couple years but i never thought to report it until your tv show i watched today. it would be amazing if someone else saw it but i doubt it. doesnt matter we know what we saw. just wanted to make a record while i could as i am now 68 and my brother 65. we were very amped up and appreciative that we had the experience.
content.summary: Green disc flying above sr26 e. followed road till out of sight parallel to road.

content.detailedDescription: August 1996 6:45 am waiting to go to work happened to see cylinder. it was amazing solid brushed aluminum appearance no sound  vented vapor for approximitaly 2 seconds. approx. 300 to 400 ft. off of ground.
content.summary: Cylinder 20-30ft dia.100 to 125 ft long no sound or openings did vent a short plumb of vapor that made noise

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting entered by fi #22542 for witness who has seen 300-400 ufos. see my 31 page initial report on all of these sightings to mich chief fi, and my later updates with further investigation results. this sighting entered at request of chief fi, one of many sightings witness has had. witness was working with family members at mother's house in redford sometime in mid 90's. mid afternoon he and brother-in-law saw a "cylinder" rotating every 2-3 seconds perhaps several city blocks away and 1000-1500 feet up. he said they could have easily driven their car directly under it. cylinder was a grey and black matte non-reflective surface with some shading variations that allowed rotation to be perceived. in my interview, witness drew small drawing (attached) which looked like upside down bottle shape, which witness agreed was more accurate. he estimated actual size as about the size of a pick-up truck. he estimated apparent size as a pinkie fingernail at arm's length. sighting lasted 2-3 minutes. witness cannot recall end of sighting. he since has done web searches to try and determine what it was they saw, and says a video from the gulf breeze sightings shows exactly what he saw. witness not sure if other family members at house also saw object. i have attempted to make contact with other witnesses provided, with limited success. none of confirmations so far were for this sighting. i have submitted results of experiencer questionnaire witness completed as appears witness may be an experiencer of some sort. indications include scar of unknown origin, finding scratches in morning of unknown origin on his and girlfriend's back, multiple sightings across generations of family members, several concurrently, recall of glowing mantis like face after 'god flash' sighting, and sheer number of sightings.
despite wording of next question, which cannot be changed, i was not a witness. there were only 2 witnesses in the 1990's event, and i am not one of them.
content.summary: Cylinder rotating in sky few blocks away. two witnesses. multiple sightings
